name: TIYANAK (2022)
description:
SYNOPSIS

            Isha’s life changed forever after receiving what seems to be an innocent letter from a childhood friend, Lydia. Expecting a reunion, Isha will learn about Lydia’s darkest secret.

GAME INFO

           “Tiyanak” is a horror game loosely based on a myth from the Philippines, Tiyanak is a vampiric creature in the form of a newborn baby/infant, The game is set in mid 80’s Manila with an art style heavily influenced by Filipino classic horror films.

CONTROLS

  • [E] - interact
  • [WASD] - walk
  • [SHIFT] - run
  • [ESC] - pause
  • [MOUSE] - look

Game Engine - Unity

Aspect Ratio - 4:3

Merry Christmas & Happy New Year!!!

🎄🎁🎶🍷🎆
